Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Excelsior Hotel in New York (Upper West Side), you'll be minutes from Theodore Roosevelt Memorial and Rose Center for Earth and Space. This hotel is close to Central Park and Rockefeller Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 199 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional amenities include gift shops/newsstands and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Excelsior Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Excelsior Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Theodore Roosevelt Memorial - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Central Park - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

Bethesda Fountain - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

American Irish Historical Society - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Neue Galerie New York - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 8.6 km / 5.4 mi
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 20 km / 12.4 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 22.3 km / 13.9 mi

The preferred airport for Excelsior Hotel is New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Message.Text:
******************************************************************************Anyone booking/staying at the hotel should be 21 years old or older Anyone under the age of 21 must be accompanied by an adult/ El minimo de edad para reservar y/o quedarse en el hotel es de 21 a¿os. Menores de 21 a¿os deben ir acompa¿ados de un adulto. ******************************************************************************

************************************************************************* ROOM TYPES AVAILABLE: DA - QUEEN SIZE BED ROOM 62 - 2 DOUBLE BEDDED ROOM (2 PAX) 63 - 2 DOUBLE BEDDED ROOM (3 PAX) 64 - 2 DOUBLE BEDDED ROOM (4 PAX) T+ - 2 DOUBLE BEDDED SUPERIOR ROOM (3 PAX) C+ - 2 DOUBLE BEDDED SUPERIOR ROOM (4 PAX) W+ - 2 DOUBLE BEDDED SUPERIOR ROOM (2 PAX)

***MANDATORY FACILITY FEE DIRECT PAYMENT AT THE HOTEL***(it will apply to bookings made Julyst,2018 and moving forward). FACILITY FEE 21$ + 14.75% taxes , which provides our guests with exclusive amenities and services,such as: -Free Basic Wi-Fi Access for 3 devices (per room) -Use of the Business Centre, equipped with desktop computers and printing services. - Access to state of the art fitness center. - USA Today available at front desk. - Unlimited local (domestic) and 1-800 phone calls.- A complimentary bottle of Saratoga Spring water (1 bottle per day). - Exclusive to hotel guests only-10% off at Calle Ocho Restaurant *IT IS A MANDATORY CHARGE PER ROOM PER NIGHT*

THE SUPERIOR AND DELUXE ADDITIONAL FEE APPLIES FOR SOFA BED ADDITIONAL GUEST FEES WILL INCREASE FROM $20 TO $25 PER PERSON IN AN EXISTING BED CHILDREN CONSIDERED ADULT OVER THE AGE OF 11 YEARS OLD MAX IN ANY ROOM IS 4 GUEST.

CITY TAX USD 3.50 PER ROOM/NIGHT TO BE PAID DIRECTLY AT THE HOTEL(STAND.ROOMS) CITY TAX USD 5.50 PER ROOM/NIGHT TO BE PAID DIRECTLY AT THE HOTEL(SUP.ROOMS) ******************************************************************************TASA TURISTICA USD 3.50 HAB/NOCHE PAGO DIRECTO EN HOTEL(HAB. STANDARD) TASA TURISTICA USD 5.50 HAB/NOCHE PAGO DIRECTO EN HOTEL(HAB.SUPERIOR)

INFO RESTAURANT Please note as of July 1,2019 Calle Ocho restaurant/bar will no longer be in service, we will advise once we have a new restaurant on board

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
